devices.title: HiFi Esparagus
devices.description: Esparagus HiFi MediaLink is a handy low cost media device that will upgrade your legacy audio system with cutting-edge internet streaming capabilities and enhance your audio experience. It exposes line level output that you can plug into a stereo amplifier. It uses the legendary PCM5100 series DAC with supreme audio quality.

devices.title: Loud Esparagus
devices.description: Loud Esparagus is aimed to be paired with small-to-medium sized speakers in a small room. It uses a dual MAX98357 Hi-Fi DAC that will output 3W per speaker. Admittedly not much, but well enough for a kid's room or work place. Due to the D-class amp, it barely uses power and can be paired with a standard USB wall charger.

devices.title: Amped-Esparagus
devices.description: Amped Esparagus, is a device based on PCM5100 HiFi DAC (just like HiFi Esparagus) but adds a powerful and efficient D-class amp (TPA3110D2) so it can drive speakers directly. It has similar power capabilities to the Louder Esparagus, but it is much simpler to set up and use, since this DAC doesn't need any configuration steps to get going, just a valid I2S audio stream.

devices.title: Louder Esparagus
devices.description: Louder Esparagus is a top-of-the-range model that uses modern highly capable TAS5805M DAC and is aimed to be paired with medium-to-large speaker systems. With 25W per channel stereo output it packs a punch and can easily enliven living quarters or dorm rooms. It can be used both with Wi-Fi and Ethernet (to make sure bad Wi-Fi would not interrupt the stream)

devices.title: Hifi-ESP32
devices.description: HiFi-ESP32 is a reviewed design of the HiFi-ESP model, that includes onboard WROVER module with external Wifi antenna. It dramatically improved WiFi perception while usage of the WROVER module maintains lower device cost.

devices.title: Loud-ESP32
devices.description: Loud-ESP32 is a reviewed design of the ESP Audio Duo model, that includes onboard WROVER module with external Wifi antenna. It dramatically improved WiFi perception while usage of the WROVER module maintains lower device cost.

devices.title: Amped-ESP32
devices.description: Amped-ESP32 is an extension of the HiFi-ESP32 board, it adds a high quality D-class amp to the PCM5100 DAC. You can use either 3.5mm jack for line output (amp will be muted) or screw terminals to connect speakers.

devices.title: Louder-ESP32
devices.description: Louder-ESP32 is a reviewed design on the Louder-ESP model, that includes onboard WROVER module with external Wifi antenna. It dramatically improved WiFi perception while usage of the WROVER module maintains lower device cost.

title: Sonocotta TAS5805M boards (Louder-ESP32 / Louder-Esparagus): Stereo Mode

devices.title: Stereo 2.0
devices.description: Flat STEREO mode with no processing

devices.title: Stereo 2.0 (Loudness #1)
devices.description: STEREO mode with following EQ settings: (+9db_20Hz)(-1Db_500Hz)(+3Db_8kHz)(+3Db_15kHz)

devices.title: Stereo 2.0 (Loudness #2)
devices.description: STEREO mode with following EQ settings: (+9db_20Hz)(-3Db_500Hz)(+3Db_8kHz)(+3Db_15kHz)

devices.title: Stereo 2.0 (Loudness #3)
devices.description: STEREO mode with following EQ settings: (+12db_30Hz)(-3Db_500Hz)(+3Db_8kHz)(+3Db_15kHz)

title: Sonocotta TAS5805M boards (Louder-ESP32 / Louder-Esparagus): Bridged Mode

devices.title: Mono 1.0
devices.description: Flat BRIDGED MONO mode with (L+R)/2 routing

devices.title: Subwoofer 40 Hz
devices.description: Subwoofer BRIDGED MONO mode with (L+R)/2 routing and 40 Hz cutout

devices.title: Subwoofer 60 Hz
devices.description: Subwoofer BRIDGED MONO mode with (L+R)/2 routing and 60 Hz cutout

devices.title: Subwoofer 100 Hz
devices.description: Subwoofer BRIDGED MONO mode with (L+R)/2 routing and 100 Hz cutout

title: Sonocotta TAS5805M boards (Louder-ESP32 / Louder-Esparagus): Bi-Amp Mode

devices.title: Bi-Amp (M) 60Hz crossover
devices.description: Bi-Amp MONO mode with (L+R)/2 routing and 60Hz crossover

devices.title: Bi-Amp (L) 60Hz crossover
devices.description: Bi-Amp MONO mode with LEFT channel only and 60Hz crossover

devices.title: Bi-Amp (R) 60Hz crossover
devices.description: Bi-Amp MONO mode with RIGHT channel only and 60Hz crossover

devices.title: HiFi ESP
devices.description: HiFi ESP is a handy low cost media device that uses the legendary PCM5100 series DAC with supreme audio quality.

devices.title: ESP Audio Duo
devices.description: ESP Audio Duo is aimed to be paired with small-to-medium sized speakers in a small room. It uses a dual MAX98357 Hi-Fi DAC that will output 3W per speaker.

devices.title: Louder-ESP
devices.description: Louder ESP is a top-of-the-range model that uses modern highly capable TAS5805M DAC and is aimed to be paired with medium-to-large speaker systems. With 25W per channel stereo output it packs a punch and can easily enliven living quarters or dorm rooms.

devices.title: ESP32-LyraT v4.3
devices.description: ESP32-LyraTThe ESP32-LyraT development board is targeted at audio applications equipped with the ESP32 dual-core chip, such as Wi-Fi speakers, Bluetooth speakers, voice remote controls, and all smart home applications that require audio functions.

devices.title: ESP32-LyraT-Mini
devices.description: ESP32-LyraT Mini is a hardware platform based on the dual-core ESP32 for developing audio applications, such as Wi-Fi speakers, Bluetooth speakers, voice remote controls, and smart home applications with one or more audio functions.

devices.title: ESP32-LyraT v4.2
devices.description: ESP32-LyraTThe ESP32-LyraT development board is targeted at audio applications equipped with the ESP32 dual-core chip, such as Wi-Fi speakers, Bluetooth speakers, voice remote controls, and all smart home applications that require audio functions.

devices.title: ESP32-Audio-kit (ES8388)
devices.description: ESP32-Audio-kit is a small audio development board developed by Ai-Thinker based on the ESP32-A1S module. Most audio peripherals are distributed on both sides of the development board. It supports TF card, headphone output, two microphone inputs and two speaker outputs. It is convenient for developers to develop quickly.
